title: Find the Entrance Sign
description: Find the entrance sign to the Wizarding World of Harry Potter.

title: Catch the Simpsons' Phone Call
description: Outside of the Kwik-E-Mart in Springfield, you can pick up the phone when it rings to hear Simpsons characters on the other line!

title: Take a Picture with a Mascot
description: Find your favorite mascot and take a photo with them!

title: Gringotts Dragon
description: Take a photo of the dragon on the top of Gringotts Bank, while it breathes fire.

title: Norweigan Flag spotting
description: There's a flag of Norway somewhere in the park. Find it and take a photo.

title: Palace Theater Arcade
description: Win a prize from the claw machine at the Palace Theater Arcade and take a photo of it.

title: Transformers - Press the Button
description: While waiting in line for the Transformers ride, there's a button on one of the walls. Press it and take a photo of what the lights do.

title: Stop The Ride!!
description: In Krustyland, clips from episodes of The Simpsons are shown on TVs. Take a photo of the clip where Bart has a rough experience on a roller coaster.

title: Banana Trees
description: It's no secret that the Minions love bananas. There's actually banana trees planted in the park because of them. Find them and take a photo.

title: See the Animals
description: Go see the animals at the Animal Actors on Location show and take a photo of your favorite one. It's worth seeing.
